    • メソッドの詳細

      • getRiffId

        public byte[] getRiffId()
        Get method of field RIFF ID
        戻り値:
        byte[4] Fixed value "RIFF"

      • setRiffId

        public void setRiffId(byte[] riffId)
               throws DataFormatException
        Set method of field RIFF ID
        パラメータ:
        riffId - The value that should be set to field RIFF ID
        例外:
        DataFormatException - According to RIFF data format, [RIFF ID] Must be "RIFF". Otherwise, DataFormatException will be thrown with warning message.

      • getRiffSize

        public int getRiffSize()
        Get method for field RIFF Size
        戻り値:
        int Size of RIFF data.

      • setRiffSize

        public void setRiffSize(int riffSize)
        Set method for field RIFF Size
        パラメータ:
        riffSize - RIFF data size

      • getRiffType

        public byte[] getRiffType()
        Get method for field RIFF Type
        戻り値:
        byte[4] RIFF Type. For example, "WAVE" for wav file

      • setRiffType

        public void setRiffType(byte[] riffType)
        Set method for field RIFF Type
        パラメータ:
        riffType - RIFF Type. For example, "WAVE" for wav file

      • getRiffData

        public byte[] getRiffData()
        Get method for field RIFF Data First this function will call abstract method spellRiffData to fill data buffer, and then return data buffer.
        戻り値:
        byte[] RIFF data

      • setRiffData

        public void setRiffData(byte[] riffData)
        パラメータ:
        riffData -
